article_title: Weekend festivals in Ohio attract country-music stars
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Ohio seems to have cornered the market for country music festivals, hosting five multiple-day festivals over the summer months. And the trend extends beyond Ohio, said Jessica Boudevin, who covers the business of country music for Venues Today, a live-entertainment trade publication.
